Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2011 02:04AM rhonda2011 wrote: How is everyone doing?  I just had mine today....yeserday) ... cant sleep.   there is alot of blood building up in the guaze under my arm.   although it looks like it has stopped as its dry.   she told me to leave the gauze and bra on until wednesday.   but i think i will call her in the AM .   anyone else have this?
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy tomorrow,,,,feeling weepy vanlex rhonda2011

Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2011 07:10AM rhonda2011 wrote: I had my surgery today.   Lumpectomy with sentinel node testing or removal.   I think they removed a couple of Lymph nodes although my Doctor did not see any suspition... they will be tested as well as the margins surrounding the cancer.   Im nervous about the next steps.   If there is no cancer detected in the Lymph nodes...  there is a speedy radiation available.   I think 5 days a row twice a day and thats it?   sounds too good to be true!    Anyone else doing this type of radiation?  Thanks,  pease,  and God's healing to you all.  and if anyone wants to  play words with friends.... let me know.    Rhonda
